LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedCaptain.label: Miho Eltex Officer Dress
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedCaptain.descr: An Officer uniform worn by high-ranking officers of the Miho Empire. Grants access to the Encourage skill. Used officer uniforms that occasionally appear on the market are popular for their fetishistic appeal.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedMiho.label: Miho Eltex Apparel (inner)
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedMiho.descript: A high-quality traditional dress made of Ebonsilk.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedOne.label: Miho Eltex Apparel
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedOne.descripti: A high-quality traditional dress made of gold and Ebonsilk.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedTwo.label: Miho Eltex Outfit (Arcane Shield)
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedTwo.descripti: A high-quality traditional dress made of gold and Ebonsilk. Additionally it creates a shield around the wearer to intercept projectiles.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Militia.label: Miho Security Dress
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Militia.description: A dress for soldiers. It's not perfect, but it provides decent protection.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_PMC.label: Miho Trooper Dress
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_PMC.description: A dress for PMC soldiers. It dissipates the shock to some extent.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Pariah.label: Miho Pariah Battle Suit
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Pariah.description: An anti-psychic suit powered by the mechanites in the user's body. It aims for increased close combat capabilities and perfect user protection.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Simple.label: Miho Regular Clothes
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Simple.description: The traditional attire for Miho. It resembles the women's clothing of a peninsular country on the ancient Earth.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Hoodie.label: Miho Hoodie
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Hoodie.description: A warm hoodie. "Where're the pants? I don't know..."
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Shirt.label: Miho Shirt
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Shirt.description: A cool shirt. "Where's the bottom? I don't know..."
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Regular.label: Miho Regular Dress
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Regular.description: A basic dress for Miho. It can be worn comfortably anywhere, whether privately or in a formal setting.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Maid.label: Miho French Maid Dress
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Maid.description: They probably called this a maid's uniform in the Gauls region of ancient Earth, but we'll give it a pass because it's cute.
